socratic_questions:
1. What is the definition of factorial?
2. Can you demonstrate how to calculate 7!?
3. How can you use the distributive property to simplify 8! - 7!?
4. What is the significance of 7! in the expression 8! - 7!?
5. Can you factor out 7! from the expression 8! - 7!?
6. How can you simplify the expression after factoring out 7!?
7. What is the final result when you compute 8! - 7! without using a calculator?
8. Can you think of other examples in which you can use the same simplification methods to simplify expressions involving factorials?
